Name: amvd
Overview: Automated Music Video Downloader :: AMVD is a Lidarr Companion script to automatically download and tag Music Videos for use in various media applications

@attributes.Name: Host Path for /config
@attributes.Description: Container Path: /config

@attributes.Name: Host Path for /downloads-amvd
@attributes.Description: Container Path: /downloads-amvd

@attributes.Name: Enable Automatic Script Start
@attributes.Description: true = Enabled :: Runs script automatically on startup

@attributes.Name: Script Interval
@attributes.Description: #s or #m or #h or #d :: s = seconds, m = minutes, h = hours, d = days :: Amount of time between each script run, when AUTOSTART is enabled

@attributes.Name: Musicbrainz Mirror URL
@attributes.Description: OPTIONAL: Only change if using a different mirror

@attributes.Name: Musicbrainz Rate Limit
@attributes.Description: OPTIONAL: musicbrainz rate limit, musicbrainz allows only 1 connection per second, max setting is 10

@attributes.Name: Music Videos Source Connection
@attributes.Description: lidarr or ama :: ama requires the AMA config folder to be mounted as a volume: /ama

@attributes.Name: Lidarr Url
@attributes.Description: Set domain or IP to your Lidarr instance including port. If using reverse proxy, do not use a trailing slash. Ensure you specify http/s.

@attributes.Name: Lidarr API Key
@attributes.Description: Lidarr API key

@attributes.Name: Music Videos Country Code
@attributes.Description: Set the country code for preferred video matching, uses Musicbrainz Country Codes, lowercase only.

@attributes.Name: Music Videos Require Match
@attributes.Description: true = enabled :: Only keep videos that could be matched to a Musicbrainz music track.

@attributes.Name: Music Videos Subtitle Langauge
@attributes.Description: Desired Language Code :: For guidence, please see youtube-dl documentation

@attributes.Name: Music Videos Filter Match
@attributes.Description: This will filter out videos Matching MusicBrainz secondary release type and album disambiguation (single word only)

@attributes.Name: Music Videos Write NFO
@attributes.Description: true = enabled :: Create NFO and Local Thumbnail for use in applications such as Kodi

@attributes.Name: Music Videos Use Folders
@attributes.Description: true = enabled :: Creates subfolders using the Lidarr Artist folder name

@attributes.Name: Music Videos Use Video Folders
@attributes.Description: true = enabled :: Creates subfolders using Video File Name only, requires USEFOLDERS to be enabled

@attributes.Name: Music Videos Folder Permissions
@attributes.Description: Based on chmod linux permissions

@attributes.Name: Music Videos File Permissions
@attributes.Description: Based on chmod linux permissions

@attributes.Name: PUID
@attributes.Description: Container Variable: USER_ID

@attributes.Name: PGID
@attributes.Description: Container Variable: GROUP_ID
